description:
In this PyMCon Web Series event, we're joined by Todd Hendricks from the Legal Defense Fund in NYC. He walks us through his notebook, model and analysis showing how his team leverages hierarchical binomial distributions to ensure fair voting practices. It includes his expertise on the complicated process of voting and his team's focus on vote dilution, a problem not easily noticeable in election systems.
